install.name: Rapid Contact
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows a notice (when site will be down, etc.) box for site visitors.

param.name: name_label
param.label: Name Label
param.description: The label next to the name input.

param.name: email_label
param.label: Email Label
param.description: The label next to the email input.

param.name: subject_label
param.label: Subject Label
param.description: The label next to the subject input.

param.name: message_label
param.label: Message Label
param.description: The label next to the message text area.

param.name: email_recipient
param.label: Email Recipient
param.description: The recipient of the contact mail.

param.name: button_text
param.label: Button Text
param.description: The text on the send button

param.name: page_text
param.label: Thank you text
param.description: The text displayed to the user when he sends a message

param.name: error_text
param.default: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.
param.label: Error page text
param.description: The text displayed to the user when the message fails to be sent

param.name: no_email
param.label: No Email Error Message
param.description: The error message when the user does not write an email

param.name: invalid_email
param.label: Invalid Email Error Message
param.description: The error message when the user writes an invalid email

param.name: from_name
param.label: Mail From Name
param.description: The name of the message's sender

param.name: from_email
param.label: Mail From Email
param.description: The email of the message's sender

param.name: exact_url
param.label: Exact URL
param.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. If your site is http and your server/host supports https this should be No.

param.name: disable_https
param.label: Disable HTTPS
param.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. Please enable it if Rapid Contact posts in https and your site is http.

param.name: pre_text
param.label: Small Intro Text
param.description: A small text shown before (above) the message form

param.name: fixed_url
param.label: Fixed URL
param.description: A simple solution to people that want to use Rapid Contact in an exact page. Change this to Yes and write the URL of Rapid Contact in the Fixed URL Address parameter

param.name: fixed_url_address
param.label: Fixed URL Address
param.description: If fixed url is true, this address is used for Rapid Contact to post itself.

param.name: enable_anti_spam
param.label: Enable Anti-spam
param.description: Enable this to use the anti-spam question for anti-spam control

param.name: anti_spam_q
param.default: How many eyes has a typical person?
param.label: Anti-Spam Question
param.description: A small text question, preventing you from every automated spam

param.name: anti_spam_a
param.label: Anti-Spam Answer
param.description: The correct answer to the anti-spam question

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: If you want to apply a custom style, change this class suffix.
